attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.

Could you please also remove reference to individuals. Your petition should make a point about government policy when you resubmit.
reasons: Material which is potentially confidential, commercially sensitive, or which may cause personal distress or loss
Statements that don't actually request any action
